title: The lagggggg
body:
Hey just posting here to see if i can get some help with my connection issues.
So i rarely experience connection issues and last night i had normal ping then next thing i know it is spiking to 500-900 every 3 or 4 seconds. i have ran diagnostics and it shows that there is no problem on my end. i have submitted a ticket a few hours ago.  My girlfriend and i play games together and never lag on the same internet and now i cant even play a custom game with 0 bots without pinging over 1300.

Any help would be appreciated.
Thank you.

replies.body: It looks like a tech specialist was able to get back to you through your ticket.  Check out his response, and feel free to hit him up if you have any questions.  He'll take care of you!
If the problem persists i will just uninstall. I have done absolutely everything i can and now i just wait getting more and more frustrated.
